column4: UPDATE 5-Broadcom plans record tech deal with Qualcomm bid -sources
column5: Nov 3 Communications chipmaker Broadcom Ltd is planning to unveil a bid for smartphone chip supplier Qualcomm Inc by Monday  three sources familiar with the matter said on Friday  an attempt to create a roughly $200-billion company through the biggest technology acquisition ever.

column4: UPDATE 1-Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions
column5: Nov 3 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Friday:

column4: Broadcom explores deal to buy Qualcomm-Bloomberg
column5: Nov 3 Broadcom Ltd is exploring a deal to buy smartphone chip maker Qualcomm Inc  in what could be the biggest ever acquisition of a chipmaker  Bloomberg News reported on Friday.
